item.title: Leetcode.616 Add Bold Tag in String
item.author: carlhejiayu@gmail.com (Jiayu Carl He)
item.description: This description/problem statement could be found here. This question can be disected by three parts.In the following, I am going to dicuss in details with code on how to proceed in each part. The working solution is defined as followed class Solution: def addBoldTag(self, s: str, dict: List[str]) -> str: #STEP1 intervals = [] for word in dict: start = 0 wordLength = len(word) startIndex = s.find(word, start) while startIndex !
